events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and all required documents are attached.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to clear software development experience.
Recruiter John Doe has been assigned to manage the candidate's process and coordinate the next steps efficiently.
The candidate completed the initial screening call successfully, showing strong knowledge in software engineering fundamentals.
Candidate has responded promptly to schedule the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to assess advanced software development skills.
Candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving abilities and coding practices.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 18th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture fit and compensation expectations.
Candidate had a positive HR interview session and expressed alignment with company values and team environment.
We have extended a formal job offer to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits aligned with market standards.
Candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and is excited about joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date for early June.
Onboarding process has started with the candidate completing all initial training and compliance documentation.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
